title: Vasa Multi-Plane Pyramid Sculpture
description:
The pyramids of luminous construction are created by layering colored planes within clear geometric forms. To fully appreciate these works of art, it is essential to observe them from different angles. The sculptures' dimensionality contributes to an ever-changing appearance. Sculptor Vasa Velizar Mihich and his team create each piece by hand in Los Angeles CA. Signed by the artist.

  • Dimensions: 5 x 5 x 4.75 in.

*Please note that due to the handmade nature, each product may vary in design/look/appearance.
